scripts.test:subscriber: serverless invoke local --function subscriber -e SUBSCRIPTIONS_TABLE=dev-SubscriptionsTable -e EVENTS_TABLE=dev-EventsTable -e TEAMS_TABLE=dev-TeamsTable --path subscriber/event.test.js
scripts.test:fetch: serverless invoke local --function fetch -e SUBSCRIPTIONS_TABLE=dev-SubscriptionsTable -e EVENTS_TABLE=dev-EventsTable -e TEAMS_TABLE=dev-TeamsTable --path fetch/event.test.js
scripts.test:dispatcher: serverless invoke local --function dispatcher -e SUBSCRIPTIONS_TABLE=dev-SubscriptionsTable -e EVENTS_TABLE=dev-EventsTable -e TEAMS_TABLE=dev-TeamsTable --path dispatcher/event.test.js
scripts.test:push: serverless invoke local --function push -e SUBSCRIPTIONS_TABLE=dev-SubscriptionsTable -e EVENTS_TABLE=dev-EventsTable -e TEAMS_TABLE=dev-TeamsTable --path push/event.test.js
